The sponsor of this content has sole editorial control.” In the instances where Healthline Media receives a payment when users purchase, or sign up for the product or service the page may also include this language, “Healthline and our partners may receive a portion of revenues if you make a purchase using a link above.” Partner pages may also include a “what’s this” link that takes users to a page that explains the nature of the partnership.

points.quoteText: As part of our advertising and partnerships, we work closely with third parties (for example, business partners, advertising networks, analytics providers and search information providers) and may receive information about you from them.

points.quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold Healthline, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers harmless from and against any claims, actions or demands, liabilities, and settlements, including without limitation reasonable legal and accounting fees, resulting from, or alleged to result from, (i) your use of and access of the Services, (ii) your violation of any term of these Terms of Use, (iii) your violation of any third party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right, or (iv) any claim that your use of the Services caused damage to a third party.

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
points.quoteText:
We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our information practices.
If we make any material changes, then we will notify you by email (sent to the email address specified in your account) or by means of a notice on this website prior to the change becoming effective

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.quoteText: We do not currently recognize automated browser signals regarding tracking mechanisms, which may include "Do Not Track" instructions.

points.quoteText: Data Analytics: Web analytics services, including third-party services such as Google Analytics, collect information about how visitors use our Websites, on both an individual and aggregated basis

points.quoteText: We may share your information with third parties who provide services on our behalf to help with our business activities such as ad technology providers, authentication services, email service providers, data analyzers, and business intelligence providers for the purpose of enhancing our products and services.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
points.quoteText: We request that persons under the age of 17 not use our Website without supervision from a responsible adult

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
points.quoteText: Healthline is not responsible for the content of linked third-party sites

points.quoteText: The Services and the Content are provided on an "as is" basis and your use of the Services and the Content is at your own risk.

Please visit http://preferences-mgr.truste.com/ if you wish to opt out of interest-based advertising.
Please visit http://www.youronlinechoices.eu if you are located in the European Union

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.quoteText: You may elect to reject cookies by adjusting your settings, but doing so will limit the range of features available to you on our Services and other major websites that use cookies.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.quoteText: You may stop using the Services at any time (subject to the surviving terms set forth herein).

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
points.quoteText: <li>It should go without saying, but all illegal activity is prohibited and may be reported to the appropriate authorities.

points.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
points.quoteText: • Finally, don’t spam anyone.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.quoteText: You may opt out of our use of your Personal Information for marketing, market research, or direct marketing purposes at any time by sending a rights request as set forth in the "Your Rights" section below.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
points.quoteText: Healthline also may terminate these Terms of Use and/or Services at any time and may do so immediately without notice.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.quoteText: Healthline assumes no liability for or relating to the delay, failure, interruption, or corruption of any data or other information transmitted in connection with use of the Services.

Terms of Use

points.quoteText: We use your information to allow us or third parties to deliver advertisements based on your interests on our Websites, affiliated websites or third-party sites

points.quoteText: If you access our Services from your mobile device, we may collect unique user ID, cell phone model, operating system, and carrier.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
points.quoteText: We also partner with third parties and partners to display advertising on our Websites or to manage our advertising on other sites. Our third-party partners may use cookies or similar technologies in order to provide you advertising based upon your browsing activities and interests.

points.quoteText: <li>Remove or refuse to post any Comments for any or no reason in our sole discretion.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
points.quoteText:
We may transfer your Personal Information to a third party in the event of a transfer of all or some of our assets to a third party, provided that the third party agrees to adhere to terms similar to those of this Privacy Policy.
Where required by applicable law, we will provide you with an opportunity to reject the transfer of your Personal Information in such cases.</p

points.quoteText: These companies are authorized to use your personal information only as necessary to provide these services to us.
